overview: Ye Qingyu, the son of the ancient Xue Guo general, suffered misfortune overnight and became a beggar. In order to return to the court to find out the truth, he applied to the martial arts academy, and wanted to counterattack and get revenge. In the meantime, after experiencing love and secret calculations, one by one strangers did not care about life and death to help him complete his great cause, and his life experience became a mystery.
title: Imperial God Emperor 1
